snippet.title: PC-88 The Screamer (1984 Magical Zoo) Gameplay - English translation by gargatar
snippet.description:
Here is some gameplay for a very old cyberpunk / post-apocalyptic japanese RPG, called "The Screamer" and produced by Magical Zoo in 1984.
The game is very hard and unforgiving, as you can easily see here. If you die in the game, your savegame gets erased from the disk, like in the old wizardry games. Be sure to make a backup! :) 
Also, be sure to downgrade your CPU speed to 2.0 Mhz otherwise the enemies will be too fast and you will die even more easily than in the normal game :)
Gargatar did a partial english translation patch for this game, a patch which you can easily get on the romhacking.net site. 
Art is by Shohei Harumoto. The game was also ported to PC98 and Sharp X1.
